mapper.insert: insert into feed_comment set feed_id = #{feedId}, user_id = #{userId}, comment = #{comment}
mapper.select: SELECT a.feed_comment_id as feedCommentId, a.comment, b.user_id as writerUserId, IF(b.nick_name IS NULL, b.uid, b.nick_name) AS writerNm, b.pic as writerPic FROM feed_comment a INNER JOIN user b ON a.user_id=b.user_id WHERE a.feed_id = #{feedId} order by a.feed_id desc limit #{sIdx},#{size}
